Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near 95th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
